flawed_nl_solution:
The Lion King made 220 million in profit because 200 - 10 = <<200-10=220>>220
Star Wars made 440 in profit because 220 x 2 = <<220*2=440>>440
Star Wars earned 465 million because 25 + 440 = <<25+440=465>>465
#### 465

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 190, not 220. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
